titleInfo.title: PZ 5013/40 'Propaganda among Shi'ite communities in Iraq and Persia'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 98; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This volume consists of letters, telegrams and memoranda relating to reports on propaganda among Shi'ite communities in Iraq and Persia.The file includes correspondence on the visit of the Nawab of Bahawalpur (Maulvi Mohamed Bashir and the report of his visit on propaganda among Shi'ite communities in Iraq (ff 30-41) and Persia (ff 42-49).Included in the file (ff 94-96) is the report on the conversation with Khan Sahib Saiyid Tahir Hussain Qureshi by the Vice-Consul at HM Consulate, Baghdad.Principal correspondents are HM Ambassador, Baghdad, and HM Ambassador, Tehran.
